memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, T *zb)
memberdef.name: conserveElevation

briefdescription.para: Conserves elevation across all active blocks by applying elevation conservation on each block's boundaries.

detaileddescription.para: Iterates over all active blocks and applies conservation routines for left, right, top, and bottom boundaries.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< float > XBlock, EvolvingP< float > XEv, float *zb)
memberdef.name: conserveElevation< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< double > XBlock, EvolvingP< double > XEv, double *zb)
memberdef.name: conserveElevation< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, T *zb)
memberdef.name: conserveElevationGPU

briefdescription.para: Conserves elevation on the GPU for all active blocks using CUDA kernels.

detaileddescription.para: Launches CUDA kernels for left, right, top, and bottom boundaries, synchronizing after each.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< float > XBlock, EvolvingP< float > XEv, float *zb)
memberdef.name: conserveElevationGPU< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< double > XBlock, EvolvingP< double > XEv, double *zb)
memberdef.name: conserveElevationGPU< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, T *zb)
memberdef.name: WetDryProlongation

briefdescription.para: Performs wet/dry prolongation for all block boundaries.

detaileddescription.para: Applies prolongation logic to left, right, top, and bottom boundaries where block level is greater than neighbor.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< double > XBlock, EvolvingP< double > XEv, double *zb)
memberdef.name: WetDryProlongation< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< float > XBlock, EvolvingP< float > XEv, float *zb)
memberdef.name: WetDryProlongation< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, T *zb)
memberdef.name: WetDryRestriction

briefdescription.para: Performs wet/dry restriction for all block boundaries.

detaileddescription.para: Applies restriction logic to left, right, top, and bottom boundaries where block level is less than neighbor.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< double > XBlock, EvolvingP< double > XEv, double *zb)
memberdef.name: WetDryRestriction< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< float > XBlock, EvolvingP< float > XEv, float *zb)

memberdef.name: ProlongationElevation

briefdescription.para: Prolongs elevation values from parent to child block halo cells, handling dry/wet logic.

detaileddescription.para: Copies elevation and water surface values from parent to child halo if any neighbor is dry.

memberdef.argsstring: (int halowidth, int blkmemwidth, T eps, int ib, int ibn, int ihalo, int jhalo, int ip, int jp, int level, T dx, T *h, T *zb, T *dzbdx, T *dzbdy)
memberdef.name: RevertProlongationElevation

briefdescription.para: Reverts prolongation for elevation, adjusting bed elevation using gradients.

detaileddescription.para: Applies gradient-based correction to bed elevation in halo cells if any neighbor is dry.

memberdef.argsstring: (int halowidth, int blkmemwidth, T eps, int ib, int ibn, int ihalo, int jhalo, int ip, int jp, T *h, T *dhdx, T *dzsdx)
memberdef.name: ProlongationElevationGH

briefdescription.para: Prolongs gradient and water surface values from parent to child block halo cells, handling dry/wet logic.

detaileddescription.para: Sets gradients to zero in child halo if any neighbor is dry.

memberdef.argsstring: (int halowidth, int blkmemwidth, T eps, int ib, int ibn, int ihalo, int jhalo, int i, int j, T *h, T *zs, T *zb)
